recipe.title: Smoked Salmon Smørrebrød
ingredients: 1 tablespoon finely grated peeled fresh horseradish
4 slices Danish rye or pumpernickel bread
Dill sprigs and flat-leaf parsley leaves
instructions: Whisk potatoes, if using, sour cream, horseradish, dill, parsley, and lemon juice in a small bowl; season with salt and pepper.
For assembly: Spread horseradish sour cream on bread and top with smoked salmon, radishes, roe, if using, dill, and parsley. Season with pepper.
